keyMoments.title: Franky Runs Naked Through Water 7
keyMoments.description: Franky runs through the streets without his swim briefs, declaring that even a naked man is great if he faces the waves like a lion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's eccentric and carefree personality.
keyMoments.quote: Even a naked man is great, if he faces the waves like a lion!

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Reminds Franky of His Dream
keyMoments.description: Iceburg reminds Franky of his childhood dream to build the ultimate ship and sail on it as its shipwright, confronting his guilt over Tom's death.
keyMoments.significance: Addresses Franky's emotional barriers and reignites his original dream.

keyMoments.title: Franky Recalls Building the Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Flashback showing how Franky gathered the rogues and destitute of Water 7 to form the Franky Family.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's compassion and leadership, explaining his deep connection to his followers.

keyMoments.title: Franky Officially Joins the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Franky agrees to join the Straw Hat Pirates as their shipwright, recognizing that the Thousand Sunny needs proper care.
keyMoments.significance: Franky becomes the seventh member of the Straw Hat Pirates, fulfilling his dream to sail on his own ship.
keyMoments.quote: You guys are amateurs at ship repair. That ship needs a proper shipwright!

relationships.description: Iceburg acts as a mentor and friend, helping Franky overcome his guilt and pursue his dream.

evolutionMoments.description: Iceburg delivers an emotional speech helping Franky confront his guilt over Tom and remember his dream.

relationships.description: Franky joins Luffy's crew as the shipwright of the Thousand Sunny.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky officially becomes a member of the Straw Hat Pirates under Luffy's captaincy.

relationships.description: Zambai is a key member of the Franky Family, whom Franky considers his little brother.

evolutionMoments.description: The Franky Family encourages Franky to leave and pursue his dreams, demonstrating their selfless love.

reveals.information: Wants to sail on the ship he built as its shipwright
Joins the Straw Hat Pirates as shipwright

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Reminds Franky of His Dream
keyMoments.description: Iceburg delivers an emotional speech reminding Franky of his childhood dream and helping him confront his guilt over Tom.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the emotional catalyst for Franky's decision to join the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: Your dream when growing up was to build the ultimate ship and sail on it as its shipwright.

relationships.description: Fellow apprentice under Tom, now acting as a mentor to help Franky move forward.

evolutionMoments.description: Iceburg helps Franky overcome his guilt and pursue his dream.

keyMoments.title: Robin Uses Devil Fruit Powers on Franky
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to physically persuade Franky by grabbing his sensitive areas.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's willingness to use unconventional methods to recruit Franky to the crew.

keyMoments.title: The Franky Family Encourages Franky to Leave
keyMoments.description: Zambai and the Franky Family demonstrate their love by encouraging Franky to pursue his dreams and leave them behind.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strength of the bond between Franky and his family, and their selfless support for his happiness.

relationships.description: Zambai is a key member of the Franky Family and considers Franky his big brother.

evolutionMoments.description: Zambai and the Franky Family selflessly encourage Franky to leave and join the Straw Hats.
